item.title: Posh Reverse Shell
item.description: When you ware working in a Windows environment, whether Active Directory is involved or not, there will come a time when you need a reverse shell, and most reverse shells from Pentest Monkey arent going to work in your situation. Gaining RCE on a Windows box typically means you have access to either cmd or Powershell. Getting a reliable shell can give some trouble, but luckily, Powershell has the ability to call and run Powershell scripts remotely without dropping anything on disk.
